tool_description: Unlock a world of knowledge with our powerful book retrieval API. Discover a vast collection of books from various genres.
name: BookPi
title: BookPi

api_list.name: Search for a Book by Name
api_list.description: This Endpoint Enables You To Search For A Specific Book Within A Database Of Books By Name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bookpi.p.rapidapi.com/books/Valis"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bookpi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bookpi.p.rapidapi.com/books/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bookpi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Show all Books
api_list.description: This Endpoint Gives You Access to Retrieve and Display All Books Present in the Database.
